casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. William M. LINDENFELD, Defendant-Appellant. No. 279, Docket 21012. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 11, 1948. Peter J. Haberkorn, of New York City, for plaintiff-appellant. J. Vincent Keogh, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Mario Pittoni, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for plaintiff-appellee.

Before AUGUSTUS N. HAND, CHASE and FRANK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
